text:
The most important test cases for markers work but there are still some 
special instances where we get wrong results. Since we have to rework page 
breaking anyway, it's probably best to revisit markers at that point. I will 
get to that quite soon, but if someone starts before that, even better.

Simon, thanks for looking into this. I'm not quite sure I got your 
instructions for a "markers5c" right. I'd appreciate if you'd check in the 
test case you created.
